English: You need a <color=orange>Bulkhead Security Key</color> to activate the Bulkhead Door Controller
Description:
Don't localize Bulkhead Security Key and Bulkhead Door Controller.
A text that appears on screen when the player is standing close to a Bulkhead Door Controller but doesn't have a Bulkhead Security Key. Don't alter the RichText tags.

French.Translation: Il vous faut une <color=orange>clé de cloison de sécurité</color> pour activer le contrôleur de porte à cloison.

Italian.Translation: Hai bisogno di una <color=orange>chiave di protezione stagna</color> per attivare il controller della porta stagna

German.Translation: Sie benötigen einen <color=orange>Schott-Sicherheitsschlüssel</color>, um die Schott-Türsteuerung zu aktivieren

Spanish.Translation: Necesitas una <color=orange>llave de contención [BULKHEAD_KEY]</color> para activar el controlador de puerta de contención.

Russian.Translation: Требуется <color=orange>ключ безопасности</color>, чтобы активировать терминал ворот.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Você precisa de uma <color=orange>chave de segurança</color> para ativar o controle de portas protetoras

Polish.Translation: Potrzebujesz <color=orange>klucza grodzi</color>, aby aktywować panel sterowania grodzi.

Japanese.Translation: 遮断壁の操作盤を起動するには <color=orange>遮断壁のセキュリティキー</color> が必要

Korean.Translation: 격벽 문 제어기를 작동시키려면 <color=orange>격벽 보안 열쇠</color>가 필요합니다.

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 你需要一把<color=orange>艙門安全鑰</color>來啟動艙門控制器

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 需要<color=orange>舱壁安全钥匙</color>才能开启舱壁门控制器

name: InGame.InteractionPrompt.BulkheadKeyNeededToActivate
